about_the_game:
Shooter for Dummies puts players in the perspective of a dummy. Play the most iconic FPS PvP maps: CTF, Team Deathmatch, Kill confirmed... where the winning is not the common goal: The dummy with less receiving damage wins! But don't worry dummies, you can punch players almost off the map!

Play in teams of 5 players to the different game modes:
  • Capture the flag
  • Team deatchmatch
  • Rush
  • Kill confirmed
  • Conquest
  • King of the hill

There are always 2 ways to finnish a map: by completing the map objectives, or after 5 minutes of game. Dummies, you are the target! Only you can score for your team, and also your health is the most important element on this game. Avoid taking damange, don't let the players attack you!

Players, you are not forgotten either. You will have access to a set of temporal bonus abilities both, to attack and protect the dummies... or the other players... Use of the 4 characters and demonstrate your FPS skills on this game changing experience.

Shooter for Dummies does never ends as it starts! Tactics and strategy will be more important than ever to win.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game is a friendly shooter, but as a shooter, it might generate impactful effects on players when killing other players. There are also robots and dummies involved. 

There are no nude scenes or sexual content. There are no bad language or insults either.

name: Shooter for Dummies

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i-5
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 600
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i-5
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 720
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
